generated_audience.name: Elliot Carraway
generated_audience.about: Elliot is a self-employed financial controller who oversees operations at his mid-sized technology consultancy based in Seattle, Washington. With over 15 years of experience in financial systems management and compliance, he is adept at implementing robust tools and workflows to optimize reporting and streamline processes. Elliot is deeply involved in strategic decision-making and contributes significantly to the choice of products and services his business adopts. Known for his meticulous approach, Elliot blends analytical precision with a collaborative leadership style that fosters trust and efficiency among his 150-member team. He is passionate about staying ahead in the financial technology space and frequently participates in webinars and conferences. Outside of work, Elliot enjoys hiking the Pacific Northwest trails and experimenting with artisanal coffee roasting, a hobby that keeps him grounded and creative.

To ensure compliance with evolving regulations while reducing inefficiencies
To support sustainable company growth through robust cash flow management
frustrations: Long onboarding timelines for new financial tools
Lack of seamless integration between existing systems
Balancing cost-effectiveness with the need for cutting-edge technology

generated_audience.occasions: Engages with content during workday breaks for industry updates and after project audits to explore potential solutions

screener_questions.question: Which of the following best describes your employment status?
answer: Employed part-time (less than 30 hours per week)

screener_questions.question: Including yourself, approximately how many full-time equivalent staff does your business employ across all locations in the US?
What was the total revenue of your business in 2024 across all locations in the US?
Which of the below financial responsibilities, if any, fall within the scope of your job?
Which of the following best describes your current role in your business?
To what extent are you involved in the decision-making process about the products and services your business uses for the following?
answer: My opinion contributes to decision making

screener_questions.question: How familiar are you with the following financial systems suppliers?
answer: Know the brand well; not currently using
